item.description:
I haven't had time to check out the place, but there should be parking near the lake and we should be able to find the start of the trail from there. I'm emailing Al Caron for more specifics but if YOU know the exact location of the start of the trail please Share it with the group.

I bought a walking stick after doing the North Mountain. I'm thinking the South Mountain may be easier to do with a walking stick as well.

I found these statistics about the South Mountain.

Hiking (one way, up to the summit):
Distance: 0.6 mile
Vertical: 650 feet

More Directions
item.how_to_find_us: Look for green Volvo with EPRINT plates nearest parking to the lake

group.name: Human Soles & Doggie Paws Hikers & Walkers of Manchester, NH

item.name: Uncanoonuc South & the lake - Goffstown, NH
